description:
"You don`t have to worry about things on your own. I`m sure you have friends who will worry with you." Filming for the documentary leading up to the TSUKIPRO Concert begins in earnest, and the members of SOARA are excited. When the counseling corner of their regular variety program "TSUKIPRO ch." receives a particular question, Ohara Sora is forced to revisit his own troubles from his past.
Source: crunchyroll
